name: Your Command Center: A Settings Panel Tour
description: Ready to unlock your online potential? Let's stroll through your Settings Panel â€“ where the magic happens!

steps.title: Welcome to Your Settings Playground!
steps.description: Think of this as your mission control! The Settings Panel has three important sections: Settings, Pages, and Components. Let's dive in!

steps.title: The 'Settings' Tab: Your Website's Brains!
steps.description: Click here to access your website's general 'mood' (styling!), online address, and all the nitty-gritty configuration. Give your website personality!

steps.title: Making Your Mark: Settings Options
steps.description: Be the designer! Tweak colors, pick fonts, boost SEO, and more. Every adjustment helps your website truly shine.

steps.title: The 'Pages' Tab: Your Digital Storybook!
steps.description: Time to build your story! Click here to add, fine-tune, and organize your website's pages for smooth navigation.

steps.title: Your Pages, Your Rules: Page Management
steps.description: Craft the perfect journey for visitors! Create new pages, polish existing ones, set titles, and manage navigation. You've got this!

steps.title: The 'Design Editor' Tab: Your Creative Toolkit!
steps.description: Ready to bring your vision to life? Tap here to unlock a treasure trove of design components! Drag and drop elements onto your pages.

steps.title: Build it Beautiful: The Design Editor
steps.description: Your creativity shines here! Explore components, then just grab and pull them onto your canvas. Build a website that wows!

steps.title: Hooray, You're a Settings Pro!
steps.description: Fantastic work! You've mastered the Settings Panel. Now, customize your website exactly as you envisioned. Go create something amazing!

completionMessage: You've completed the settings panel tour! Now, put these fantastic features to work and craft the perfect online home for your business. We can't wait to see what you build!
